name: amoswap.w.aq.rl
inits: (K NONE)⦇"tmp" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x1" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x3" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x)); "x2" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w))⦈
progs: BirProgram [<|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 0w) "0E21A0AF"; bb_mc_tags := SOME <|mc_atomic := T; mc_acq := T; mc_rel := T|>; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x3" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x3" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "tmp" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x3" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x3" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x2" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32)); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x1" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Den (BVar "tmp" (BType_Imm Bit64)))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 4w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 4w) "00000013 (nop)"; bb_mc_tags := NONE; bb_statements := []; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Halt (BExp_Const (Imm32 0w))|>]
final: EVERY (λ(M,TS). HD TS "x1" = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)) ∧ M (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x)) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm32 1w)))
